Meet the Team

Who are we?

Our team is a group of four great women: Maria, Lisa, Sophie and Alexandra. We live in Florenze, and our hobbies are exploring hidden gems of nature.

How we opperate?

All our bike tours are designed and lead by us, where we do lots of research to ensure tours of top quality and safety. We create routes that provide you with culture such as sights, restaurants and wine tastings.

Why choose us?

We believe we can provide you with a lifetime experience, with a team that treat you like family.

We care about the environment, we are the only eco-friendly cycling tour in Italy. We have tours for everyone: families, couples, singles or backpackers.

Come join us on Our Tours and see why our guests love our tours!
